query: Could you construct a 3-day travel itinerary for a group of 7, beginning in Minneapolis and heading to Miami, from March 3rd to March 5th, 2022? We have set a budget of $9,600 for this trip. We would like to enjoy French and Mediterranean cuisine during our journey.
